intro: Hirtella praealta, commonly known as the tall hirtella, is a species of flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its upright growth habit and clusters of small, white to pale pink flowers. Hirtella praealta is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and along stream banks.
